name: pinot
description: Apache Pinot is a real-time distributed OLAP datastore designed to answer OLAP queries with low latency.
values:
# Pinot configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/apache/pinot/blob/master/helm/pinot/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## Controller settings
controller:
  replicaCount: 1
  image:
    repository: apachepinot/pinot
    tag: "1.5.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 512Mi
  
  ## Persistence settings for controller
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 10Gi
    storageClass: ""

## Broker settings
broker:
  replicaCount: 2
  image:
    repository: apachepinot/pinot
    tag: "1.5.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 512Mi

## Server settings
server:
  replicaCount: 2
  image:
    repository: apachepinot/pinot
    tag: "1.5.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
  
  ## Persistence settings for server
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 20Gi
    storageClass: ""

## Zookeeper settings (for Pinot metadata)
zookeeper:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 3
  
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 8Gi
    storageClass: ""
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 256Mi
  
  heapSize: 256

## Metrics configuration
metrics:
  enabled: false
  prometheus:
    serviceMonitor:
      enabled: false
